sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiproliferative effects of folate on ovarian cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨叶酸对卵巢癌细胞增殖的影响及作用机制。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibia fracture healing delays after ovariectomy.
sentences.chinese: 结论卵巢切除后，胫骨骨折愈合缓慢。

sentences.english: The fringelike fimbriae transport ovulated eggs from the ovarian surface to the infundibulum.
sentences.chinese: 花边状的伞将排出的卵，从卵巢表面运送到漏斗。

sentences.english: Radiotherapy and chemotherapy can damage the fertility and ovarian function heavily.
sentences.chinese: 放化疗严重损害患者的卵巢功能和生育能力。

sentences.english: Density of uterus gland gradually drops uterus horn near ovary to uterus body.
sentences.chinese: 子宫腺密度从卵巢端到子宫体端呈阶梯下降。

sentences.english: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) is defined as a syndrome of ovarian hyperandrogenism and chronic anovulation.
sentences.chinese: 多囊卵巢综合征以雄激素过多和持续无排卵为特征。

sentences.english: Ovarian cancer is a common gynecologic malignancy that usually can not be detected at early stage.
sentences.chinese: 卵巢恶性肿瘤是妇科常见的肿瘤，早期不易发现。

sentences.english: The main pathophysiological changes of patients with PCOS are insulin resistance, hyperinsulinemia and hyperandrogenism.
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素抵抗是多囊卵巢综合征的主要发病机制之一。

sentences.english: The results suggested that Nujin Pill could regulate the function of pituitarium-ovary axis.
sentences.chinese: 提示女金丹对垂体卵巢轴具有兴奋和调整作用。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the diagnosis and cure of the rupture of ovary endometriosis cysts.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨卵巢子宫内膜异位囊肿破裂的诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Hirsutism is frequently a result of PCOS.
sentences.chinese: 多毛症常常是多囊卵巢综合征的结果。

sentences.english: The other ovary is replaced by a fibroma .
sentences.chinese: 另一卵巢被纤维瘤替代。

sentences.english: Serious and ovarian inflammation also can destroy ovarian organization and send amenorrhoea .
sentences.chinese: 严重卵巢炎症也可破坏卵巢组织而致闭经。

sentences.english: Serious and ovarian inflammation also can destroy ovarian organization and send amenorrhoea .
sentences.chinese: 严重卵巢炎症也可破坏卵巢组织而致闭经。

sentences.english: Porcine oocytes were separated by method of collagenase and the antigen of zona pellucida was prepared by heating.
sentences.chinese: 胶原酶法分离猪卵巢卵子，热溶解制备透明带抗原。

sentences.english: At the same time, aromatase immunopositive substance also distributed in the germ cells of ovary and testis.
sentences.chinese: 同时，免疫阳性物质也定位在卵巢和精巢的生殖细胞。

definition: corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
